channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-11571] Bulk load handling from secondary region replicas
item.description:
We should be replaying the bulk load events from the primary region replica in the secondary region replica so that the bulk loaded files will be made visible in the secondaries.

This will depend on HBASE-11567 and HBASE-11568
item.summary: Bulk load handling from secondary region replicas

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This patch is built on top of hbase-11572 & hbase-11569. Thanks.
Rebase patch. Enis Soztutar Please review it. Thanks.

This message is automatically generated.

nit: mutliple -> multiple.

For the following, I think we should use HFileLinks to load the data. Both for exists check and doing actual loading. The reason is that by the time the edit is replayed, the file can be in archive directory already. That is why we should use HFileLinks always for finding the file. 


+          List<String> storeFiles = storeDescriptor.getStoreFileList();

+          for (String storeFile : storeFiles) {

+            Path storeFilePath = new Path(familyPath, storeFile);

+            if (fs.getFileSystem().exists(storeFilePath)) {

+              store.bulkLoadHFile(storeFilePath);

You can use this: 


        StoreFileInfo storeFileInfo = fs.getStoreFileInfo(getColumnFamilyName(), compactionOutput);

Why is this needed? 


-        for (String storeFile : store.getStoreFileList()) {

-          assertTrue(storeFile.equals(storeFileNames.get(index++)));

-        }

You can use HTU.getDataTestDirOnTestFS(<random>) instead of this: 


+    TemporaryFolder testFolder = new TemporaryFolder();

This reader is not closed. You can use the local field (reader). 


+    WAL.Reader reader = createWALReaderForPrimary();
The v2 patch addressed Enis Soztutar comments.

+1. You can move (on commit) the try to an outer scope for future-proofing: 


+            try {

+              StoreFileInfo storeFileInfo = fs.getStoreFileInfo(Bytes.toString(family), storeFile);

+              store.bulkLoadHFile(storeFileInfo);

+            } catch(FileNotFoundException ex) {

+              LOG.warn(getRegionInfo().getEncodedName() + " : " + storeFileInfo

+                      + " doesn't exist any more. Skip loading the file");

+            }
Thanks Enis Soztutar for the reviews! I've integrated the patch into master & branch-1.
